Skill Notes:
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 3 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Assurance (Survival): Can take an automatic 15 on Survival checks
Group Coercion: Can use Intimidation to Coerce 10 targets
Lasting Coercion: Successful Coerce lasts up to a week
Quick Coercion: Can Coerce with 1 rd of conversation
Scare To Death: (1) R30' Successful Intimidation vs. foe Will DC inflicts frightened 2; critical success inflicts frightened 2 and fleeing for 1 rd (save Fortitude critical success negates; critical failure inflicts death); failure inflicts frightened 1
Combat
Hit Points: 38 Armor Class: 21 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 18 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Half Plate Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Composite Longbow (+10 1d8+1 P [Crit +d10] R100'; dexterity; expert); Javelin (+10 1d6+3 P R30'; dexterity; expert); Scythe (+10 1d10+3 S [Crit +d10]; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Sai): Weapon Familiarity (Sai)
Battle Cry: Can use Demoralize as a free action on a foe during initiative
Exacting Strike: (1) Strike does not count toward the multiple attack penalty on failure
Intimidating Glare: Can use a glare to Demoralize
Intimidating Prowess: +1 to Coerce or Demoralize when physically menacing the target
Lightning Swap: (1) Stows held objects and draws 2 weapons or a shield and a weapon
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Terrified Retreat: Critical success on Demoralize causes a lower-level target to flee for 1 rd
Terrifying Resistance: Successful Demoralize gives self +1 saves vs. target's spells for 1 day
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +10 (dexterity; expert); Will: +9 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Notes
Validation Errors:
Battle Cry Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and intimidation rank (currently 2) >= 3
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 3 available vs. 9 allocated
Scare To Death Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15 and intimidation rank (currently 2) >= 4
Terrified Retreat Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and intimidation rank (currently 2) >= 3
